name: Grand Rifleman in San Diego
description:
Meet Grand Riflemen. He took credit for millions of dollars from boss of mafia, and now all the gangsters from San Andreas (SA) and San Diego (SD) California, want to give him problems. Grand Riflemen can only grab cars. He need 5 auto for one day. He has baseball bat, gun, rifle and machine-gun. So, hold on mafia!

This app includes:
- Beautiful California gta groove street style landscape
- Thief auto on streets
- Banks and offices robbery
- Race in city and out
- Fights with fists
- Many blows
- Interesting music
- Fun animations
- Interesting car theft
- Shooter game
- Strategy game
- Elements of puzzle game
- Secret missions with cheat code


Download Grand Rifleman in San Diego for free and try to be the lucky gangster on dangerous streets.
